label: uncl7073
comment: Code specifying the packaging terms and conditions.

values.label: Packaging cost paid by supplier
values.comment: The cost of packaging is paid by the supplier.

values.label: Packaging cost paid by recipient
values.comment: The cost of packaging is paid by the recipient.

values.label: Packaging cost not charged (returnable)
values.comment: There is no charge for packaging because it is returnable.

values.label: Buyer's
values.comment: The packaging terms and conditions are specified by the buyer.

values.label: Carrier's durable
values.comment: Reusable packaging owned by the carrier.

values.label: Carrier's expendable
values.comment: Disposable packaging supplied by the carrier.

values.label: Seller's durable
values.comment: Reusable packaging owned by the seller.

values.label: Seller's expendable
values.comment: Disposable packaging supplied by the seller.

values.label: Special purpose buyer's durable
values.comment: Reusable packaging specifically designed for packaging of the referenced item and owned by the buyer.

values.label: Special purpose buyer's expendable
values.comment: Disposable packaging specifically designed for packaging of the referenced item.

values.label: Multiple usage buyer's durable
values.comment: Reusable multi-purpose packaging owned by the buyer.

values.label: Multiple usage seller's durable
values.comment: Reusable multi-purpose packaging owned by the seller.

values.label: Not packed
values.comment: The referenced item is to be supplied without packaging.

values.label: Special purpose seller's durable
values.comment: Non-standard reusable packaging owned by the seller.

values.label: Export quality
values.comment: The packaging used must meet durability and handling characteristics required for item export.

values.label: Domestic quality
values.comment: The packaging used must meet durability and handling characteristics required for domestic usage.

values.label: Packaging included in price
values.comment: The cost of packaging is included in the item price.

values.label: Packaging costs split
values.comment: The cost of packaging is shared equally between the buyer and seller.

values.label: Packaging costs invoiced separately
values.comment: The packaging cost will be invoiced on a separate message or document.

values.label: Nil packaging costs
values.comment: The packaging is free of charge.

values.label: Nil packaging costs if packaging returned
values.comment: The costs of packaging is reimbursed by the seller to buyer if packaging is returned.

values.label: Return chargeable
values.comment: The return of packaging/empties is chargeable.

values.label: Chargeable, two thirds of paid amount with credit note on return of loaned package
values.comment: The buyer receives two thirds of paid amount with credit note if loaned package is returned.

values.label: Rented
values.comment: The package has been, or will be, rented.

values.label: Safe return deposit
values.comment: A deposit paid to guarantee the safe return of the package.

values.label: Not reusable
values.comment: The package is not reusable.

values.label: Package exchangeable at the point of delivery
values.comment: The package may be exchanged at the point of delivery.

values.label: Tamper evident package
values.comment: The package should give easy or immediate recognition that the package has been tampered with after it has been sealed.

values.label: Labeled
values.comment: The package is labeled.

values.label: Package not marked returnable
values.comment: The package is not marked returnable.

values.label: Unpack from
values.comment: Code identifying that goods should be unpacked from the identified package.

values.label: Repack in
values.comment: Code identifying that goods should be repacked into the identified package.

values.label: Pack in
values.comment: Code identifying that goods should be packed into the identified package.

values.label: Packaging recycling fee paid by supplier
values.comment: The fee for recycling packaging is paid by the supplier.
